archimate:Requirement.name: PE.1.3.4: Uninterruptible power supply (UPS) devices should have the battery capacity to allow critical systems, network equipment, voice facilities and supporting systems to shut down in an orderly manner.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
